name: Cless
description:
Less complicated than chess, but more interesting than checkers, CLESS is a digital game made in the spirit of classic tabletop games.

This game DOES NOT have a computer player or artificial intelligence, but you can play against yourself or locally against a friend!

Features 4 different themes and 2 different camera views to choose from.

You can play this game for free online: http://games.virtueone.com/uploads/game_cless/

Or, you can support me by purchasing and download the Windows or Android version!

Questions, feedback, or support: Games@virtueone.com
